items.title: Save up to 38% on Anker’s eufyCam S3 Pro solar-charging security camera multi-pack kits starting from $400
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its eufyCam S3 Pro Solar Security 2-Cam Kit (with HomeBase 3) at $399.99 shipped. Normally fetching $550 at full price, this all-encompassing package has mostly been dropping its costs to $440 over the year, with some more recent drops to $400, and one-time drops to $390 and a $380 low peppered in. You can pick it up for your home upgrades here at the next-best price from those one-time discounts lower, complete with $150 savings. There’s also the larger multi-cam kits for this model on the same page starting from $459.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupons.

We’ve secured a fantastic exclusive deal from Wellbots on the new EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra Portable Power Station at $6,999 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5ECO1000 at checkout for an additional $1,000 off. This all-new release from EcoFlow just hit the market last month and carries a $10,597 direct from the brand, whereas it starts lower at $8,299 here. The best of the discounts we’ve seen up until today was our previous exclusive price cut to $7,199. Now, we’ve gotten an even bigger exclusive deal for you with a total $1,300 savings off the going rate and $3,598 off the MSRP, landing it at a new all-time low price that you can’t beat anywhere else.

items.title: LG forced a Copilot web app onto its TVs but will let you delete it
items.summary: LG says it will let users delete the Microsoft Copilot shortcut it installed on newer TVs after several reports highlighted the unremovable icon. items.title: Tested: Baseus’ Bose-tuned XH1 are my favorite budget ANC headphones of the year costing a fraction of the high-end models
items.summary:
Buying budget wireless headphones usually meant living with obvious trade-offs – at least until a few years ago. Even today, plenty of premium models still have their own shortcomings. That being said, there’s no shortage of affordable options out there that are slowly catching up and punch well above their weight class to challenge headphones that cost $300 or more. The Baseus Inspire XH1 I’ve been using over the past few weeks is a great example, delivering effective ANC, surprisingly good sound quality, and excellent battery life. They’ve easily become my favorite budget headphones of the year – and you can read on to find out why.

more…

items.title: Score Samsung’s ViewFinity S70D 37-inch 4K HDR monitor for your workstation while it’s down to $280 all-time low ($220 off)
items.summary:
Samsung has been delivering some great deals on its Odyssey monitors as part of its holiday sale over the last few days, but B&H just dropped a standout discount on a newer 2025 ViewFinity model that Samsung itself isn’t marking down this heavily just yet. You can snag the brand’s latest 37-inch ViewFinity S70D 4K monitor for $279.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This monitor usually sells for around $500, so you’re looking at a straight-up $220 discount on it today. This is the lowest price we have tracked for it to date since its debut earlier this year as an upgraded model of the previous-gen ViewFinity model that has gone for less. For comparison, Both Samsung and Amazon are still listing it at $400, so you might want to jump in and snag this B&H offer after getting more details below.
